titles.title: The King of Love My Shepherd Is

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Where streams of living water flow My ransomed soul He leadeth, And where the verdant pastures grow With food celestial feedeth.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Perverse and foolish oft I strayed, But yet in love he sought me, And on His shoulder gently laid, And home, rejoicing, brought me.{/lang-eng}
